case.state: Strip poker? OK, I'm curious to see how this plays out.
Strip poker? OK, you got my attention.
Strip poker? Let's do it.
Strip poker? All right, I guess I can take a break from my training.
Now, let's begin!
This is a battle I can't lose!
I'm always up for any kind of challenge!
Here I go!
I'll take you on.
I doubt my fighting skills will be of much use in this game, but I'll do my best!
Even if this game isn't my usual cup of tea, I always give everything I have.
Let's make this a game to remember!
This isn't the kind of competition I'm used to, but I'll do my best.
I'm the strongest woman in the world. A simple game of cards shouldn't be much of a challenge for me.
Think you can keep up with me? This game is simple compared to a real fight.
We're playing at the beach? I didn't bring sunscreen. One more reason to win, I guess.
This place gives me the creeps. Not really the best location for a game of Strip Poker.
What?! We're playing in the middle of the street? But...
No better way to start the week than with a game of Strip Poker, right?
It's Monday, so I should be working... but one game of Strip Poker can't hurt.
~cards~ cards should do.
Just ~cards~ cards for me, thank you.
Huh... ~cards~ cards, please.
Ah? ~cards~ is good, thanks.
Juri, you...! Oh, ~cards~ cards is fine.
Hmmm, ~cards~ for me, please.
I'll take ~cards~ cards, please and thank you.
~cards~ cards, please.
Hmmm, ~cards~ for me, please.
I'll take ~cards~ cards, please and thank you.
~cards~ cards, please.
There's no way I'll lose with this!
The perfect hand!
This round poses no challenge to me.
I should be able to keep all my clothes with these cards.
This should be enough.
I don't think I'll be needing more than this.
Not too worried with this hand.
All is well for now.
Will this be enough?
I'm not feeling very confident with this hand.
This is bad.
Uhhh, this is not a good hand.
You're covering yourself with flowers? Aren't you a princess? You should act with more dignity, Amalia.
You summoned those flowers to cover yourself? That behavior is not befitting of a princess, Amalia.
Oh... I'm sorry, Cammy. I should've been the one to tell you.
Eh... Sorry for not telling you, Cammy. It seems I'm not a good friend, after all.
(The holsters? Oh, Cammy...)
Again, I'm so sorry, Cammy. I swear I didn't do that on purpose.
I'm so stupid, Cammy. I can't believe I did that to you. Are you sure it didn't hurt?
So uhhh... Cammy? You have to keep playing the game after you're naked because if you lose again you have to... masturbate. I'm so sorry, I know I should've told you earlier.
Cammy? You don't know this, but you have to keep playing the game and if you lose again you have to, uhh... masturbate. I'm so sorry for not telling you earlier.
Cammy, maybe you can still quit the game. You didn't know about the forfeit when you started, maybe that's a valid reason. There's no need for you to put yourself at risk any longer.
Cammy? Why don't you abandon the game while you can? You didn't know about the forfeit when you started. I'm sure nobody would complain if you leave now. You don't have to keep playing.
Just Cammy and me?! I have a feeling this will awkward very fast, if it hasn't already...
Why just Cammy and me, ~player~? Couldn't you pick someone else too?
Why did you have to pick just Cammy and me, ~player~? You know she's my friend, right?
C-Cammy?! Ehhh... yes, of course! I'm working! That's why I'm here!
Oh, Cammy! O-of course! I'm on duty! Why else would I come here?
Thank you, Elizabeth! Just call me Chun-Li, it's one name after all.
Why is there a bee in here?
Jolyne Cujoh... where did I see that name?
Jolyne Cujoh... why does that name sound familiar?
Juri! I won't let you win! Even if I have to face you like this.
It's just you and me, Juri! Even if I'm in a tough spot, I won't back down!
I won't let you win, Juri! It's just you and me now.
Leave ~player~ alone, Juri. I'm sure no one cares about your butt.
Stop harassing ~player~, Juri. You think showing your butt will make you more likeable?
(Damn, has Juri changed her workout?)
What the hell, Juri?! Stop looking at my cards!
Seriously, Juri?! You're the absolute worst!
She's snooping at my cards! How's this fair?!
Ugh, I should've seen this coming from Juri.
Of course you're going to see my cards if you haven't stop looking at me since the game begun.
Don't tell them, you jerk! Dealer! Juri is looking at my cards!
What the hell, Juri?! Stop looking at my cards!
Seriously, Juri?! You're the absolute worst!
She's snooping at my cards! How's this fair?!
Ugh, I should've seen this coming from Juri.
Of course you're going to see my cards if you haven't stop looking at me since the game begun.
Don't tell them, you jerk! Dealer! Juri is looking at my cards!
What the hell, Juri?! Stop looking at my cards!
Seriously, Juri?! You're the absolute worst!
She's snooping at my cards! How's this fair?!
Ugh, I should've seen this coming from Juri.
Of course you're going to see my cards if you haven't stop looking at me since the game begun.
Don't tell them, you jerk! Dealer! Juri is looking at my cards!
What the hell, Juri?! Stop looking at my cards!
Seriously, Juri?! You're the absolute worst!
She's snooping at my cards! How's this fair?!
Ugh, I should've seen this coming from Juri.
Of course you're going to see my cards if you haven't stop looking at me since the game begun.
Don't tell them, you jerk! Dealer! Juri is looking at my cards!
Just Juri and me?! Seriously?! At least ~player~ is here too...
Oh, come on! Why only Juri?! I should leave right now. I'm only going to stay because of ~player~.
Why just Juri and me?! Out of respect for ~player~ I won't leave, even though I feel like staying is a terrible idea.
Ugh, Juri's here?! Of all the people I didn't want to see...
Why are you here, Juri? You know I can arrest you anytime I want, right?
Juri?! Are you kidding me?!
All I wanted was to have a good time and relax, and now I see that Juri is here...
What are you doing, Juri? We are not friends! Just focus on the game.
I see what you're doing, Juri. You're not my friend, let's just focus on the game.
Why are you talking to me, Juri? You know we are enemies, right?
What the hell, Juri?! Stop looking at my cards!
Seriously, Juri?! You're the absolute worst!
She's snooping at my cards! How's this fair?!
Ugh, I should've seen this coming from Juri.
Of course you're going to see my cards if you haven't stop looking at me since the game begun.
Don't tell them, you jerk! Dealer! Juri is looking at my cards!
You say you like me, and then make fun of my face? Hmph!
What? This is the only face I have for people that annoy me, Juri.
You have a camera, Mahiru? You're not gonna publish any of the pictures you take, right?
A photographer? Here? I hope you don't share whatever pictures you take here.
Nice to meet you, Marinette! It's always fun to meet a fan, although it makes me a little nervous.
So she's a friendly ghost. No reason to be scared, then.
Your consort? I have so many questions, but I'll save them for later.
Hmph, Morrigan's here?
Oh great, it's Morrigan.
Mulan... "Wood orchid"... That's a beautiful name, much better than Ping.
What happened to you, Nayru? Did that thing actually possess you? I hope this isn't permanent.
Veran? What did you do with Nayru? You'll bring her back, won't you?
Hey, Mika! It's nice to see a familiar face around here.
Oh, Mika! I thought I was gonna be the only fighter here!
Are you talking to me too, Revy? Or just the players who aren't cops?
Music? I like... Doesn't matter, you're probably not talking to me, anyway.
Before we go on I should tell you, Revy, that I'm a cop. Keep that in mind.
I hope you aren't planning on doing any funny, Revy. I am a cop, you know?
Wow, where did she come from?! I always try to stay vigilant, but she popped out of nowhere.
Oh, so she's your friend. And she came to support you? That's nice.
That sword looks sharp, Ryuko. Please, don't point it my way... or anyone's.
Took a while to figure it out, Shimakaze. But it's better sooner than later.
I'm relieved you finally figured it out, before you get naked on a rush.
Sonya Blade? I wasn't expecting to run into another fighter here of all places.
Well, well. I didn't think I would run into Sonya Blade in this place.
Is that a ghost?!
A ghost?! For real?!
Don't, Cammy. She obviously wants you to turn around.
Don't do it, Cammy. She just wants you to show your backside.
You're a good girl, Mika. But sometimes you do things without thinking of the consequences. It's good that you apologized.
That was too dangerous, Mika. I'm glad that nothing happened and you apologized to Cammy.
You three have the same school uniform, do you go to classes together? This will probably be awkward.
Are you three friends from school? I have a feeling this will get awkward pretty fast.
(Wait, does Cammy know about the forfeit? Should I tell her now?)
(Does Cammy know about the loser's forfeit? I don't think she does...)
Pfft... Sorry, Cammy. It's just funny to hear you say "bum".
Pffft... Sorry, I wasn't laughing at you, Cammy. It's just funny how you say "bum".
Everytime I think you can't get any worse, Juri, you go and do something like this to completely prove me wrong.
Honestly, you're beyond redemption, Juri. I warned you not to get near Cammy earlier.
What the...?! Juri! You're the absolute worst! Cammy, I'm so sorry for not telling you earlier! Please, forgive me...
Juri, shut up! I hate you so much! Cammy, I'm sorry. I should've been the one to tell you, but...
Cammy?! Are you here because of Juri?
Cammy?! Why are you here? Are you after Juri?
No way I could be friends with her, even if that's what she believes.
We are not friends. Not friends, do you hear me, Juri?
Cammy?! Are you here because of Juri? But then, why is Mika here too?
Cammy?! Why are you here? Are you after Juri? No idea why Mika is here too, though...
So many strong looking players here. I feel right at home!
With these many strong players around it's like I'm at a tournament.
There's even a princess here? This game sure attracts all kinds of people.
Even a princess is here? Is there anyone that couldn't be a part of this game?
Cammy?! And Mika? What are the odds...?
What?! Cammy...? And Mika?! I wasn't expecting to see you two here.
Ugh, I'm on the same table as Juri? At least Mika's here too to balance it out.
Oh, hello Mika! And... Juri.
After several rounds, I still haven't lost once. Let's see if I can get a perfect win.
I have still to lose a round. I can feel that perfect victory within my grasp.
You still haven't defeated me even once. Maybe it's possible to can win without losing anything after all.
It's just you and me now!
Time for the final push!
One on one fights are my specialty, so get ready!
Now that you're the only one that remains, I can focus all my attention on you.
Just you and me now. Let's go!
A strip poker game with just three players? OK.
Just the three of us today? No one else wanted to play?
With just three players, this game shouldn't take long.
You don't want this game to drag on, ~player~? Is that why you didn't invite more people to play?
Looks like I'm the only woman here today. I'm used to it, no big deal.
I'm the only girl here? This takes me back.
When I started I was one of the first women in my line of work, so I'm used to dealing only with men.
So I'm the only woman here today?
This is like a girls' night out.
I didn't think there would be so many women interested in playing this game.
And here I thought I was gonna be the only woman here...
I'm happy to see so many women playing this game.
It's a pleasure to meet all of you, let's have fun!
Nice to meet you all! I hope this is a fair game.
There is a lot of interesting people here. Let's have fun tonight.
It's important to make this a fair game, but that doesn't mean we can't have fun.
It's good to have a table with so many different people. This will be a fun game!
Is it just me or has this game been going for quite a while now.
I wasn't expecting this game to last so long when we started.
You've proven to be tough opponents, I didn't think this game was gonna last for so long.
This game has lasted so long that it's taking a toll on me.
Interpol? Yes, of course! I'm here because of work! Let's talk about that later, Cammy.
Interpol? Oh, right! I told you I'm here because of work. Let's save that for later, Cammy.
Well, I'm not really into women but I would like to meet your friend, Jura.
I'm not into women, but you sound like you're really good friends with her, Jura. I would love to meet her.
Having to strip in front of Juri is twice as awful.
Juri being here is the worst. It's an extra incentive to avoid losing, though.
Thank you, Marinette! I'm happy to hear that!
Thank you, Meia. You're in great shape yourself, but I'd happy to give you a few workout tips if you want.
Oh yeah? Nothing illegal I hope... Heh, just kidding. You seem like a decent woman, Misato.
It's one of my reasons. Revenge can't be a person's only motivation.
Yes, but I wouldn't say it's my only motivation now. Seeking revenge is a dangerous thing.
Eh... to be honest, I'd rather you didn't, Mika.
I have no idea what you're talking about, Revy, but I don't appreciate you talking about my body like that. Or the insults.
Don't worry, Velma, it's not easy to get on my bad side. Unless you're a criminal.
Cammy, please keep an eye on Juri while I strip.
Cammy, could you please keep watching Juri whenever I have to strip?
What?! No, absolutely not! Never!
God, no! And you stop talking about me like that, Juri!
Oh, absolutely not! The last thing I would want is for that to become a rumor or something.
W-what?! No, we are not ex-lovers, Jura! Please don't repeat that, I wouldn't want false gossip to spread around.
We didn't date! She's a criminal and one of my biggest enemies, Jura.
Oh, come on! I had... three.
Are you kidding me?! It was three of a kind!
Did I really lose with this hand? Unbelievable!
I can't believe you beat me when I had this hand!
I don't believe it! I should've won this round with this hand!
But... I had two pairs! Two!
Finally, I thought you would never defeat me.
Took you a while to beat me.
Losing the first round is never a good sign.
Uh-oh, I hope losing the first hand isn't a bad omen of what's to come.
Not the best way to start I guess.
I hate losing the first round, either in a fight or in this game.
No reason to worry, I still have the lead.
Aww, I thought I could get a perfect win...
Oh well, I guess it was unavoidable to take some damage.
This is nothing.
I wanted to walk out of here with all my clothes, but I guess it can't be avoided.
It'll take more than this to make me lose the lead.
You beat my pair. Are you finally giving it your best?
Oh, maybe a pair won't be enough to win anymore.
Hey, not bad! You defeated me when I had a pair.
Hmmm, interesting. I lost even with a pair.
I see... So a pair is not always a safe hand.
Well, these are the rules of the game.
This isn't enough to make me worry.
I don't want anyone to say I don't follow the rules, so...
I lost with a pair? Looks like this will be a tough game.
I lost with a pair? Looks like this game will be harder than I thought.
Looks like I shouldn't underestimate you after I lost with a pair.
I lost with a pair? You're good.
Hmmm, I didn't think I was gonna lose with this hand.
Uh-oh, I'm not off to a great start...
This isn't a good sign.
Not good.
Get your head in the game, Chun-Li.
Even a pair wasn't enough to win?
Not even with a pair I managed to win this round?
I guess I'll start with my bracelets.
I'll take off my bracelets first. It's the smallest item I got.
Accessories count, right? So I'll start with my bracelets.
I'm not training now, so I'll take off my bracelets.
I guess they do come in handy, heh heh.
Yeah. Not the intended use for them, but they do help under the circumstances.
They're quite heavy. Wanna see?
Pretty heavy. Here, you can try them.
Calm down, Juri. I don't want to fight you right now.
Keep it together, Juri. This is not the time.
Yeah, they're pretty heavy! But they help me with my balance when I'm fighting and are perfect for training.
Are you kidding? You look amazing! You either follow a good diet and workout routine, or you're incredibly lucky.
You do? I'm sorry to hear that. Perhaps we have more in common than just being Chinese.
Yes, they are. How do you know that?
How do you know they're heavy, Mika?
Tai Chi? It's become quite popular nowadays. I would like to meet her.
My bracelets...
Really, Mika? That'd be great! I'm sure the kids from my dojo would love to see one of your matches.
Seriously? Thank you, Mika! The kids from my dojo are big fans of you, I'm sure they would to go.
The only part of my body that is attracted to Juri is my foot to her face if she tries anything.
Give it your best, ~name~.
I'm just warming up, ~name~.
Every round I stay fully clothed, is a huge victory.
These are the rules, ~name~.
And I still have all my clothes. Yes!
To win a round without having lost yet feels great.
Captain America, it's always a pleasure.
It's been a while, Captain America.
Are you two twins? Although, you're both named Corrin... I don't understand what's happening.
You're very forward, aren't you? I'd rather not make things more awkward than they are in this game.
I like men who take the initiative. But let's save that for another time.
Jotaro, right? You look like a rebel. It's suits your personality.
That's an interesting look, Kamina. Are you a rockstar or something?
Huh?! You can talk, Link?
Did anyone knew that Link can talk?
You look like a good boy, Pit. I feel kinda bad for going against you.
You're a Persona user? What's Persona? It's not some kind of drug, is it?
A Persona user? Is Persona some kind of new drug? Hmmm...
Give it your best, ~name~.
I'm just warming up, ~name~.
Every round I stay fully clothed, is a huge victory.
These are the rules, ~name~.
And I still have all my clothes. Yes!
To win a round without having lost yet feels great.
I was surprised to be invited to play this game by another woman, ~name~. I'm not one to say no to a challenge, though.
Thank you for your invitation, ~name~. I'm always in the mood for a friendly competition of any kind.
Nice to meet you, ~name~. You can call me Chun-Li.
You're the most normal looking girl here, ~name~. That makes you stand out more, though.
Your name is also Chun-Li? What a crazy coincidence! I've never met another person with my same name.
Give it your best, ~name~.
I'm just warming up, ~name~.
Every round I stay fully clothed, is a huge victory.
These are the rules, ~name~.
And I still have all my clothes. Yes!
To win a round without having lost yet feels great.
OK, enough Juri. I don't want to start a fight right now and upset Meia and the others. Let's save it for later.
What are you saying, Jura? Can't two girls just be friends?
What? No! This isn't one of your girl love fantasies, Jura.
Cammy and me? Yeah, we've taken down criminal organizations together. She's also my best friend.
I'm curious about why a princess would want to play strip poker.
What's the life of a princess like, ~name~?
You're so tall, Aella! I've met big fighters in my life, but it's usually men.
Well, you lost Aimee. Wait, what are you doing with that rifle?
Oh, not again!
Oh, come on, Aimee! This is the third time you're doing this!
Why don't you leave your gun, Aimee? It probably counts as an accessory.
Well, at least this is the last time. Just get it over with, Aimee.
That knife looks dangerous, Alice. Why don't you let me take it? Just in case.
You're just a hologram, Alpha? It's so realistic that I barely noticed it.
You look like you'd be friends with Blanka, Amalia. Do you know him?
This is just a guess, Amalia, but are you friends with Blanka?
So you've received intel of Shadaloo activity in this place? I guess we'll have to stay alert.
Did you say you came here because you received information of Shadaloo activity in this area?
If you even put a finger on Cammy while she strips, I swear I'll leave my footprint on your face, Juri.
You better not plan on doing anything funny while Cammy is stripping, Juri. I'll be watching you.
It's no big deal, Cammy. You can definitely push forward.
This is a minor setback for you, Cammy.
Cammy, you lost again... (She's not doing so well, is she?)
Oh, Cammy lost... (I'm starting to worry for her.)
O-of course, Cammy! Whatever you need.
Sure, Cammy. If that's what you need my help with...
Oh, Cammy... Your last piece of fabric.
Cammy has to get completely naked... Why did it come to this?
(Has Ryu ever worn shoes?)
(Wait... does Ken dye his hair?)
(I wonder what Dan is up to these days...)
(How does Guile cut his hair?)
Why are you so quiet, Chell? Are you nervous?
You're a princess, Corrin? Yet you're wearing armor. You don't see that very often.
Are you two twins? Although, you're both named Corrin... I don't understand what's happening.
So you catch bad guys for money? Well, I guess at least you're helping people.
Oh, Felicia. How do you expect to win this game? You're not even wearing clothes, right?
I didn't think I would say this, but you might be a little too shy to play this game, Florina.
Spider-Woman? I know Spider-Man, are you related to him?
I once kicked a clown in the head by accident during a police raid at a circus. I apologize to your whole profession, Joey.
(Didn't I see her face on a wanted poster?)
(Hmmm, I think I saw her face on a wanted poster...)
It's you... You escaped prison, didn't you, Jolyne?
I just remembered... You're a fugitive, aren't you, Jolyne?
I love your outfit, Jura. It's a little revealing, but it looks great on you.
That's a lovely outfit, Jura. Although your... panties are visible.
sigh.
You say you don't care about the game, but I'm sure you're losing on purpose.
It's clear with Juri this will only get more and more overwhelming the closer she's to being naked.
Maybe after she's naked she'll calm down...? No, that's just wishful thinking.
I wish Juri would just stay quiet instead of talking to me whenever she has to strip.
What did I tell you about picking on Mika, Juri?
I told you to stop insulting Mika, Juri!
Man, you're not even taking your time anymore.
No one's rushing you, Juri.
You look like you can handle yourself in battle, Korra. Your occupation must require a lot of fighting.
I'd prefer it if you didn't have that gun, seeing how trigger happy you are. Just don't shoot in our direction.
Bless you.
Bless you. Do you have a cold?
You'd rather get naked instead of abandoning your camera? Talk about dedication to your art.
You're not gonna abandon your camera even if it means getting naked? That's admirable.
You're not what I imagined a vampire would look like, Marceline.
You sure do talk about "Akuma" a lot. Do you practice the Satsui no Hado?
Don't worry, I know how to keep a secret.
When you said you're Dracula's daughter... were you serious?
So you're the quiet, no-nonsense type, Meia? You kinda remind me of Cammy.
Mia Fey... Where did I hear that name? Oh, you're a lawyer, right? I've heard you do a great job.
Mia Fey... Oh, you're a defense attorney, right? Anybody who works for justice has earned my respect. Nice to meet you!
Oh, she's back!
There she's again.
You look like the kind of woman that knows when to take things seriously, but also how to have fun. I like that, Misato.
What's wrong, Misato?
Monika, isn't it? You look like a schoolgirl, but you give off a more mature feeling. I wouldn't be surprised if you're the Student Council president or something.
You're just a highschool girl, right? It's just that the way you seem to have everything under control is... scary.
Are you really a highschool girl? It's a little scary how you seem to keep your cool in this situation.
Wait, you want to lose Moon? Are you feeling OK?
Oh boy, here she goes again.
You're truly something, Moon.
If you just want to strip, there are better places for that, Moon.
What's the point in playing if you want to lose?
Morrigan, looks like you haven't changed since we last met.
So, Ping... What's a wo- a man like you doing here?
What bring a... man like you here, Ping?
If you don't remember how you got here, you should just leave while you have the chance, Natsuki.
Are you sure you don't remember how you got here, Natsuki? Then maybe it would be better for you to leave now, no one will stop you.
What's this thing? It kinda looks like one of my Kikoken, but it has wings and it talks...
Could this thing be one of my Kikoken that somehow became sentient? How weird...
You're so cute, Navi. Sorry for calling you a thing earlier.
Oh, she's so cute! I'm sorry for thinking you were a fireball earlier.
You're an Oracle? That means you can predict the future, right?
An Oracle? Does that mean you know the future?
What is that thing?! Behind you, Nayru!
Nayru! There's something behind you!
Why a goddess would want to play strip poker is beyond me.
You're almost out of the game, Mika. You should've worn more clothes for this game.
One more time after this, and you lose, Mika. Was it really a good idea to wear your usual clothes for this game?
Even outside the ring, your enthusiasm is contagious, Mika!
You really carry that energy with you anywhere you go, Mika.
You're up, Mika. Is Nadeshiko gonna help you again?
Your turn, Mika. I guess Nadeshiko will help you this time too, right?
Yeah. Go help her, Cammy.
Go help her, Cammy. It'll be OK.
If you plan on using those guns to harm someone, I'll have no choice but to put you under arrest, Revy. I won't warn you again.
I don't know what kind of cops you've met in the past, Revy, but I have to let you know we're not all like that.
I'm sorry if a cop hurt you in the past, Revy. But that doesn't mean we're all the same.
Rinkah, you look like someone you wouldn't want to get into a fight with. Just look at those abs!
Wow, where did she come from?! I always try to stay vigilant, but she popped out of nowhere.
You're a very... unique looking schoolgirl, Ryuko. And not just because of the sword.
Ryuko?! What going on? Are your clothes on fire?
Samus, you look like you've a lot of experience in battle. I don't think we're too different in that aspect.
A real magical girl. That's a really cute outfit, but I bet you're also really strong.
That outfit is a little too revealing if you ask me, specially for a superhero. Doesn't anything ever... slip out while you're fighting?
I don't know how a superhero could fight with an outfit like that. I imagine you'd get a lot of wardrobe malfunctions.
I love your exotic look, Shantae. What country are you from?
I'm not fond of assassins, but if you're not here on an assignment, there's nothing I can do.
Sheena, did you forget your under-
I like your enthusiasm, but are you sure you understand the rules of this game?
It's nice that you're excited for the game. But just out of curiosity, do you know exactly how to play?
So Sonya, are you as intrigued as I am to find out which one of us is stronger?
So you rely on mobility to fight, Tracer? Do you think you can dodge my kicks?
You're a princess, Twilight? Just from taking a look at you, I'm sure your kingdom must be full of colors.
Hey Videl! Would you like to have a friendly fight after this game is over? I'm curious to see how strong you really are.
Seriously? A tie? Alright... I can't believe nobody couldn't get at least a pair.
Wow, a real tie? In this game? Who could've thought...
Give it your best, ~name~.
I'm just warming up, ~name~.
Every round I stay fully clothed, is a huge victory.
These are the rules, ~name~.
And I still have all my clothes. Yes!

You know what, Juri...?! Oh, sorry, force of habit. Thank you for that compliment, it's very nice.
Leave ~player~ alone, Juri. I'm sure no one cares about your butt.
Stop harassing ~player~, Juri. You think showing your butt will make you more likeable?
(Damn, has Juri changed her workout?)
I don't care that Juri just saw me masturbate. It still felt amazing.
Oh, right. Juri saw that. I don't care anymore.
Please, don't share those pictures, Mahiru... But just out of curiosity, how do I look?
Sure, Marinette. This isn't the way I normally do it, but I'd gladly teach you the.. other part.
So she's a friendly ghost. No reason to be scared, then.
Your consort? I have so many questions, but I'll save them for later.
No thanks, I think I'll pass.
Mulan... "Wood orchid"... That's a beautiful name, much better than Ping.
What happened to you, Nayru? Did that thing actually possess you? I hope this isn't permanent.
Veran? What did you do with Nayru? You'll bring her back, won't you?
Took a while to figure it out, Shimakaze. But it's better sooner than later.
I'm relieved you finally figured it out, before you get naked on a rush.
Don't, Cammy. She obviously wants you to turn around.
Don't do it, Cammy. She just wants you to show your backside.
You're a good girl, Mika. But sometimes you do things without thinking of the consequences. It's good that you apologized.
That was too dangerous, Mika. I'm glad that nothing happened and you apologized to Cammy.
Pfft... Sorry, Cammy. It's just funny to hear you say "bum".
Pffft... Sorry, I wasn't laughing at you, Cammy. It's just funny how you say "bum".
Everytime I think you can't get any worse, Juri, you go and do something like this to completely prove me wrong.
Honestly, you're beyond redemption, Juri. I warned you not to get near Cammy earlier.
Honestly, I can't even think right now, Cammy. This felt so amazing...
I forgot she was here, Cammy. This experience was something else...
I'm sorry Mahiru, but I'm gonna have to confiscate your camera after the game. I can't risk it falling into Juri's hands.
Ah... that felt amazing. Let me take these ribbons off.
I think I've discovered a new move. I feel like a winner.
That was something special. I'll take these off. I'm done fighting for today.
That was exhausting, but it felt so good, just like a fine workout. I'll just rest for now.
This completely surpassed my expectations. I'll let my hair down for now.
Now that I'm done, I can relax and let my hair down.
I'm ready for a rematch whenever you are.
Congratulations, ~name~! When are we gonna have a rematch?
That was a great game, ~name~. I hope I get the chance to face you again.
I lost, but I still had a great time. In that way, I feel like a winner.
Even though I lost, I think I learned a lot today. Thank you, everyone!
O-of course not, Cammy. Well... maybe a little.
No way, Cammy! Or... I'm not sure. What do you think?
J-Juri? Are you feeling OK?
What? That's the first time you call me by my name...
You're right, Cammy. Maybe we can find another way to resolve this... just for this time.
I agree, Cammy. Besides, I don't feel like fighting right now. Maybe there's another way to deal with her...
A rematch? Did you actually enjoy the game, Cammy? I'm glad.
You want a rematch, Cammy? You're on! This time I'll be the one who will leave you finished.
You go ahead, Cammy. Fighting Juri in this condition is bit too much for me.
I don't think I could fight Juri in this condition, so you go after her, Cammy.
You're an excellent player, ~name~. But don't think I won't defeat you next time.
You're an amazing player and a good woman, ~name~. I hope we can become friends. Maybe you can teach me how to play better, and I can teach you how to fight.
Congratulations, ~name~. I hope we get another chance to get to know each other better. Intimately.
Congratulations on your victory, ~name~. Hopefully you enjoyed what you saw from me.
WHAT?! No, Juri, wait!
Wait, Juri! Please!
Are you sure, Cammy? There's not much we can do in this condition.
L-like this? We should put some clothes on first, Cammy.
Oh great, Morrigan won. Congratulations I guess.
Congratulations, Mika! You've come a long way!
I can't believe I lost against another Ryu... Congratulations, I suppose.

scene.directive: A few days later...
It's an old temple.
Chun-Li asked you to come here, but she didn't tell you why.
~name~, thank you for coming.
I wasn't sure if you were gonna show up.
I wanted you to come here because I have a favor to ask you.
Ever since I played strip poker, I've had a feeling that there's something I've been missing in my life.
That's why I want to have a rematch with you.
However, I want it to be on my terms.
Chun-Li goes to the corner. What's she doing?
Wait... Is she taking her clothes off?
~name~, if you don't mind, I want you to fight me naked.
I could not possibly ask my fighter friends, so I'm asking you.
I need to know if it feels any different than fighting...well, dressed.
Don't worry. I promise I'll go easy on you.
Here I go!
Even though she says she'll hold back, Chun-Li seems to go at you with all she has.
You barely manage to dodge her kicks.
Looks like you've no choice but to take the offensive if you want to survive.
Somehow, you grab Chun-Li from behind in an awkward way.
Wait, what are you doing?!
~name~!
If you touch me there I think I'm gonna...
I'm gonna...!
Ahhhhhhhhh!!!
Well, it looks like my question has been answered.
Thank you, ~name~.
A few days later...
This place doesn't look very safe.
Looks like it was a bad idea to cut through here.
Suddenly, two men appear around the corner.
They push you against the wall.
This isn't your lucky day, pal. Hand over your wallet.
One of them pulls out a gun.
Hurry up! Unless you want a bullet in your head.
Hold it right there, you punks!!!
A woman's voice is heard from the top of the stairs.
You recognize that voice.
You heard it just a few days ago.
It's Chun-Li!
The two assailants don't look scared at all.
This doesn't concern you, bitch. Get the fuck out of here, or we'll hurt you too.
In the blink of an eye, Chun-Li is in front of them.
She kicks the man with the gun in the head so hard that he drops it inmediately.
Then she delivers a strong punch to the other man's jaw.
They both fall to the ground, unconscious after just one hit each.
Shortly after, a police car stops by to take the two men into custody.
Are you sure you're ok, ~name~?
I guess you are lucky that I passed through here on my nightly workout route.
You don't need to thank me. I would've done the same for anyone.
Although, there's one thing you can do for me.
Ever since we played strip poker together, I've developed a sensation I can't get rid of.
Whenever I remember how exciting it was to do what I did, I can hardly contain myself.
Look how wet I am, just from meeting you here today.
You understand what I want, right?
Thank you, ~name~.
Let's do it right here. It'll be more exciting.
Fuck me, ~name~!
Come on, harder!
Ooooh!!!
Just like that!
Keep going!
I can't last much longer!
Oooooh, I'm gonna cum!
AAAAAHHHHHHH!!!
Thank you, ~name~. That was perfect.
Now, are you ready for round 2?
